resources.string:
State Capitals Quiz App

This app can be take quizzes about the state capitals. Each quiz consists of 6 questions based on state capitals. Each quiz is unique. Open the nav drawer to view the navigation menu. You will be able to invoke the app\'s functions. You will be able to access the following screens:

New Quiz
Here, you will be able start a new quiz.

Review past quizzes
Here, you will be able to review all of your past quizzes. The previous results are ordered by date/time from newest to oldest. They will include date and time of the quiz along with the score.

Close app
The app will be closed.

Get help
Useful help information about the app will be displayed.
